subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A. made 72 percent of its shots in the second half, got a career-high 27 points on 11-for-15 shooting from the star guard Arron Afflalo and finished with 29 assists as a team.
snippet: U.C.L.A. made 72 percent of its shots in the second half, got a career-high 27 points on 11-for-15 shooting from the star guard Arron Afflalo and finished with 29 assists as a team.
